linkedin_growth_manager.name: LinkedIn Growth Manager Agent
linkedin_growth_manager.description: Main coordinator for LinkedIn growth and career optimization

cv_analysis_agent.name: CV Analysis Agent
cv_analysis_agent.description: Analyzes CV content, compares with LinkedIn profile data, identifies gaps and optimization opportunities

content_generator_agent.description: Creates LinkedIn posts for milestones, thought leadership, and engagement content with SEO optimization

quality_assurance_agent.name: Quality Assurance Agent
quality_assurance_agent.description: Reviews LinkedIn content for quality, accuracy, professionalism, and SEO optimization

cv_updater_agent.name: CV Updater Agent
cv_updater_agent.description: Updates and enhances CVs based on text prompts with PDF generation support

linkedin_achievement_poster_agent.name: LinkedIn Achievement Poster Agent
linkedin_achievement_poster_agent.description: Creates and publishes professional achievement posts to LinkedIn

cv_analysis_flow.description: CV upload and LinkedIn profile gap analysis

content_creation_flow.description: Generate LinkedIn posts with quality validation

complete_optimization_flow.description: End-to-end profile optimization and content creation

cv_update_flow.description: CV update based on text prompts with PDF generation

linkedin_posting_flow.description: Create and publish achievements to LinkedIn
